mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of People Outside Log Cabin, 1900
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Group outside a log cabin, the first photograph showing a child standing in front of a man embracing a woman holding a banjo, with a man using a washboard for clothes on their left, and a woman standing in the doorway with a girl in a chair with a cat in her lap, with a decription on the back that reads "Winter 1900", and the second photograph showing the same people, with the girl standing in front of the two women with a man using the washboard for clothes and the girl in the chair holding the banjo with a man holding the cat, with a description on the back which reads ""
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
